caption.p: Location and background of the Yangtze River Delta ( a) and the sediment sampling and hydrodynamic observation sites ( b). Main reservoirs with dam height >50 m in the Yangtze basin are shown in Fig. 1a. In Fig. 1b, the area in grey represents the subaqueous delta, and the area in white represents the Pleistocene relic sand. NC: North Channel, SC: South Channel, NP: North Passage, and SP: South Passage. The figures were created using ArcGIS 10.1 ( www.esri.com/software/arcgis) and CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6 ( http://www.coreldraw.com/en/product/graphic-design-software).
